description: Generate an OpenSSL public key from its private key.

path.description: Name of the file in which the generated TLS/SSL public key will be written.

state.description: Whether the public key should exist or not, taking action if the state is different from what is stated.

force.description: Should the key be regenerated even it it already exists

privatekey_path.description: Path to the TLS/SSL private key from which to generate the public key.
